name: Free Life in color Illustrations
description:
With this free illustration pack, you can enhance your project with a splash of color and outer space characters, this free illustration collection is part of Artify vector illustrations, which have 5k illustrations packed in more than 70 design styles, with a built-in editor to adjust the design to your liking.


Highlights


  • Easy to edit and change colors
  • Organized components
  • Illustrations are scalable to any size you need (Vector sources)
  • Easy to use for developers (SVG included)
  • Download It Now


Meet Artify illustrations and get over 5000 vector illustrations in more than 70 unique design styles


And check the Creative Toolkit, the biggest pack of design resources ever: +5000 illustrations, 300 design vector packs, a powerful online editor & a huge gallery with thousand of designs, 5000 3D icons and characters
